methods.name: CalibrateTilt
methods.doc: Calibrate the tilt for the input device

EqualEqual_KeyKey
GetKey
methods.doc:
Returns the key for this event.

@return  Key name

methods.name: GetModifierKeysState
methods.doc: Returns a snapshot of the cached modifier-keys state for the application.

methods.name: InputChord_GetDisplayName
methods.doc: @return The display name of the input chord

methods.name: InputEvent_IsAltDown
methods.doc: Returns true if either alt key was down when this event occurred

methods.name: InputEvent_IsCommandDown
methods.doc: Returns true if either command key was down when this event occurred

methods.name: InputEvent_IsControlDown
methods.doc: Returns true if either control key was down when this event occurred

methods.name: InputEvent_IsLeftAltDown
methods.doc: Returns true if left alt key was down when this event occurred

methods.name: InputEvent_IsLeftCommandDown
methods.doc: Returns true if left command key was down when this event occurred

methods.name: InputEvent_IsLeftControlDown
methods.doc: Returns true if left control key was down when this event occurred

methods.name: InputEvent_IsLeftShiftDown
methods.doc: Returns true if left shift key was down when this event occurred

methods.name: InputEvent_IsRepeat
methods.doc: Returns whether or not this character is an auto-repeated keystroke

methods.name: InputEvent_IsRightAltDown
methods.doc: Returns true if right alt key was down when this event occurred

methods.name: InputEvent_IsRightCommandDown
methods.doc: Returns true if right command key was down when this event occurred

methods.name: InputEvent_IsRightControlDown
methods.doc: Returns true if left control key was down when this event occurred

methods.name: InputEvent_IsRightShiftDown
methods.doc: Returns true if right shift key was down when this event occurred

methods.name: InputEvent_IsShiftDown
methods.doc: Returns true if either shift key was down when this event occurred

methods.name: Key_GetDisplayName
methods.doc: Returns the display name of the key.

methods.name: Key_GetNavigationActionFromKey
methods.doc: Returns the navigation action corresponding to this key, or Invalid if not found

methods.name: Key_GetNavigationDirectionFromAnalog
methods.doc: Returns the navigation action corresponding to this key, or Invalid if not found

methods.name: Key_GetNavigationDirectionFromKey
methods.doc: Returns the navigation action corresponding to this key, or Invalid if not found

methods.name: Key_IsAnalog
methods.doc: Returns true if the key is an analog axis

methods.name: Key_IsAxis1D
methods.doc: Returns true if the key is a 1D (float) axis

methods.name: Key_IsAxis2D
methods.doc: Returns true if the key is a 2D (vector) axis

methods.name: Key_IsAxis3D
methods.doc: Returns true if the key is a 3D (vector) axis

methods.name: Key_IsButtonAxis
methods.doc: Returns true if the key is a 1D axis emulating a digital button press.

methods.name: Key_IsDigital
methods.doc: Returns true if the key is a digital button press

methods.name: Key_IsGamepadKey
methods.doc: Returns true if the key is a gamepad button

methods.name: Key_IsKeyboardKey
methods.doc: Returns true if the key is a keyboard button

methods.name: Key_IsModifierKey
methods.doc: Returns true if the key is a modifier key: Ctrl, Command, Alt, Shift

methods.name: Key_IsMouseButton
methods.doc: Returns true if the key is a mouse button

methods.name: Key_IsValid
methods.doc: Returns true if this is a valid key.

methods.name: ModifierKeysState_IsAltDown
methods.doc: Returns true if either alt key was down when the key state was captured

methods.name: ModifierKeysState_IsCommandDown
methods.doc: Returns true if either command key was down when the key state was captured

methods.name: ModifierKeysState_IsControlDown
methods.doc: Returns true if either control key was down when the key state was captured

methods.name: ModifierKeysState_IsShiftDown
methods.doc: Returns true if either shift key was down when the key state was captured

methods.name: PointerEvent_GetCursorDelta
methods.doc: Returns the distance the mouse traveled since the last event was handled.

methods.name: PointerEvent_GetEffectingButton
methods.doc: Mouse button that caused this event to be raised (possibly FKey::Invalid)

methods.name: PointerEvent_GetGestureDelta
methods.doc: Returns the change in gesture value since the last gesture event of the same type.

methods.name: PointerEvent_GetGestureType
methods.doc: Returns the type of touch gesture

methods.name: PointerEvent_GetLastScreenSpacePosition
methods.doc: Returns the position of the cursor in screen space last time we handled an input event

methods.name: PointerEvent_GetPointerIndex
methods.doc: Returns the unique identifier of the pointer (e.g., finger index)

methods.name: PointerEvent_GetScreenSpacePosition
methods.doc: Returns The position of the cursor in screen space

methods.name: PointerEvent_GetTouchpadIndex
methods.doc: Returns the index of the touch pad that generated this event (for platforms with multiple touch pads per user)

methods.name: PointerEvent_GetUserIndex
methods.doc: Returns the index of the user that caused the event

methods.name: PointerEvent_GetWheelDelta
methods.doc: How much did the mouse wheel turn since the last mouse event

methods.name: PointerEvent_IsMouseButtonDown
methods.doc: Mouse buttons that are currently pressed

methods.name: PointerEvent_IsTouchEvent
methods.doc: Returns true if this event a result from a touch (as opposed to a mouse)
